The framework for multi-agent communication on mobile robotics market

This framework enables developers such p2p technologies as IPFS and Ethereum in order to provide communication with an autonomous base of mobile robotics.

With Drone P2P you can solve the following tasks:

Configure the launch of multiple drones by the operator on a signal sent through the broadcast channel ipfs pubsub.
Create serverless private accounts for operators with direct access to the drones fleet.
Join the program of open markets of Robonomics.

Today's available Drone P2P assistant services:

Registration of the drone’s ID in the Ethereum mainnet Blockchain.
Publication of flight routes and missions.
Flight simulation and route correction before the drone’s departure.
